ethics approval required.label: ethics approval required
ethics approval required.description: This data use modifier indicates that the requestor must provide documentation of local IRB/ERB approval.

health or medical or biomedical research.label: health or medical or biomedical research
health or medical or biomedical research.description: This data use permission indicates that use is allowed for health/medical/biomedical purposes; does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

publication required.label: publication required
publication required.description: This data use modifier indicates that requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

user specific restriction.label: user specific restriction
user specific restriction.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is limited to use by approved users.

population origins or ancestry research.label: population origins or ancestry research prohibited
population origins or ancestry research.description: This data use modifier indicates use for purposes of population, origin, or ancestry research is prohibited.

collaboration required.label: collaboration required
collaboration required.description: This data use modifier indicates that the requestor must agree to collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

non-commercial use only.label: non-commercial use only
non-commercial use only.description: This data use modifier indicates that use of the data is limited to not-for-profit use.

not for profit, non commercial use only.label: not for profit, non commercial use only
not for profit, non commercial use only.description: This data use modifier indicates that use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations and not-for-profit use, non-commercial use.

research specific restrictions.label: research specific restrictions
research specific restrictions.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is limited to studies of a certain research type.

time limit on use.label: time limit on use
time limit on use.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is approved for a specific number of months.

not for profit organisation use only.label: not for profit organisation use only
not for profit organisation use only.description: This data use modifier indicates that use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

data use modifier.label: data use modifier
data use modifier.description: Data use modifiers indicate additional conditions for use.

population origins or ancestry research.label: population origins or ancestry research only
population origins or ancestry research.description: This data use permission indicates that use of the data is limited to the study of population origins or ancestry.

genetic studies only.label: genetic studies only
genetic studies only.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is limited to genetic studies only (i.e., studies that include genotype research alone or both genotype and phenotype research, but not phenotype research exclusively)

clinical care use.label: clinical care use
clinical care use.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is allowed for clinical use and care.

no general methods research.label: no general methods research
no general methods research.description: This data use modifier indicates that use does not allow methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

institution specific restriction.label: institution specific restriction
institution specific restriction.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is limited to use within an approved institution.

geographical restriction.label: geographical restriction
geographical restriction.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is limited to within a specific geographic region.

disease specific research.label: disease specific research
disease specific research.description: This data use permission indicates that use is allowed provided it is related to the specified disease.

data use permission.label: data use permission
data use permission.description: A data item that is used to indicate consent permissions for datasets and/or materials, and relates to the purposes for which datasets and/or material might be removed, stored or used.

general research use.label: general research use
general research use.description: This data use permission indicates that use is allowed for general research use for any research purpose.

project specific restriction.label: project specific restriction
project specific restriction.description: This data use modifier indicates that use is limited to use within an approved project.
